name: cuttlebone
description: ukagaka shell renderer for web browser

scripts.build: npm run build-src; npm run build-test
scripts.build-src: node node_modules/coffee-script/bin/coffee -cm --join lib/cuttlebone.js -- src/header.coffee src/*.coffee src/footer.coffee
scripts.init: npm update; bower update; npm run build; npm run watch

author: Ikagaka
